channel.title: Java not Reconnized! [508]
channel.description:
hey, i was trying to run a 508 client to play somebody's server but this error message keeps on poping up!
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue . . .
:mad:how do i fix this so i can run the server, help!!!!!?!?!? :eek:

item.title: Java not Reconnized! [508]
item.dc:creator: @zachrida zachrida
item.description:
@zachrida wrote:

do you see this when you edit the run.bat jdk1.6.0_## you change the ## to you java you downloaded and you can check what java you downloaded by start>my computer>programfiles>java>then you will see jdk1.6.0._## then you will paste that in that spot

Read full topic
